title: How to Mix a 666 Cocktail

steps.headline: Pour the Sambuca into a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: The preferred type of this mix is Luxardo Sambuca Passione Nera.

steps.headline: Add the raspberry liquor into the shaker.
Add the pineapple juice to the shaker.
Add the lemon juice to the shaker.
Add the egg white to the shaker.

text: Pour the Sambuca into a cocktail shaker. The preferred type of this mix is Luxardo Sambuca Passione Nera. Add the raspberry liquor into the shaker.  Add the pineapple juice to the shaker.  Add the lemon juice to the shaker.  Add the egg white to the shaker.  Add ice and shake well.  Stain into a cocktail glass.
